localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Filma is here to simplify the complex, giving all users; from experienced editors to first-time hobbyists, the ability to create powerful video compositions in a fast and effective manner. ⠀ Advanced features include Masking, Keyframing or Motion Tracking.
blogPost.body: Filma is here to simplify the complex, giving all users; from experienced editors to first-time hobbyists, the ability to create powerful video compositions in a fast and effective manner. ⠀ Advanced features include Masking, Keyframing or Motion Tracking.
blogPost.title: Filma - High-end video editing on the go for iPhone, iPad and Mac
blogPost.author: Chris Messina

localize.description: Filma在这里简化了复杂的功能，为所有用户提供了从经验丰富的编辑到第一次业余爱好者的能力，能够以快速有效的方式创建强大的视频合成。⠀高级功能包括遮罩、关键帧设置或运动跟踪。
localize.tagline: 针对iPhone、iPad和Mac的高端视频随时随地编辑

localize.description: Filma在這裏簡化了複雜的功能，爲所有用戶提供了從經驗豐富的編輯到第一次業餘愛好者的能力，能夠以快速有效的方式創建強大的視頻合成。⠀高級功能包括遮罩、關鍵幀設置或運動跟蹤。
localize.tagline: 針對iPhone、iPad和Mac的高端視頻隨時隨地編輯

previous.excerpt: Entry is a FaceID for desktops. It enables users to securely authenticate online using regular webcams with no compromise to privacy and security. Add Entry to your Single Sign-On provider as a factor and authenticate by face, just like on a mobile device.
previous.title: Entry - Biometric Authentication Factor for SSO

localize.description: Entry是一款适用于台式机的FaceID。它使用户能够使用常规的网络摄像头安全地进行在线身份验证，而不影响隐私和安全。将 Entry 添加到您的单点登录提供商中作为一个因子，并通过脸部验证，就像在移动设备上一样。
localize.tagline: 用于单点登录的生物识别认证因素

localize.description: Entry是一款適用於臺式機的FaceID。它使用戶能夠使用常規的網絡攝像頭安全地進行在線身份驗證，而不影響隱私和安全。將 Entry 添加到您的單點登錄提供商中作爲一個因子，並通過臉部驗證，就像在移動設備上一樣。
localize.tagline: 用於單點登錄的生物識別認證因素

next.excerpt: Once we asked ourselves, 'Why are expense trackers so expensive?' We decided to correct this unfairness and ready to present to your attention the first completely free expense tracker.
next.title: Le Ruble – free expense tracker - Take control of your money

localize.description: 有一次我们问自己："为什么费用追踪器这么贵？我们决定纠正这种不公平的现象，并准备向您介绍第一个完全免费的费用追踪器。
有一次我們問自己："爲什麼費用追蹤器這麼貴？我們決定糾正這種不公平的現象，並準備向您介紹第一個完全免費的費用追蹤器。
